title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: In the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.
OB: No item can be selected on the first attempt in the library outline view.
EB: The second time I select the item, it can be successfully selected.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Launch the application.
2. Go to the library outline view.
3. Try to select any item in the view.
4. Observe that the item cannot be selected on the first attempt.
5. Repeat the selection attempt for the same or different item.
6. Observe that the item can be successfully selected on the second attempt.
